instruction: Please analyze the performance of the MSCI ACWI Index alongside respective domestic investments for American, Japanese, Canadian, Australian, British, or European investors, and compare the volatility of each.
output: Understood. Based on the exhibit provided, it appears that the MSCI ACWI Index diversified across geographies, including emerging markets, displayed less volatility than each of the domestic indexes in our analysis, except for the Australia index. I will conduct a thorough analysis and provide insights on the performance and volatility of each investment option.
